column2: an A.M. Eatery////A few days later
column3: my husband surprised me with a trip to Snooze on a Saturday morning at 9am. Again
column4: not ideal. We sat there for the entire 45 minute quoted wait time. Once we were seated
column5: I made some arrogant comment about how there is no meal in the planet I'd ever willingly wait 45 minutes for
column6: and that all these people were just trying to jump on some cool bandwagon to be able to tell their co-workers on Monday morning that they went to THIS brunch spot.
